description: 30% chance to burn target.
Thaws user.

allMovesData.name: Sticky Web
description: Lays entry hazards which slow foes Speed by 1 stage when switching into battle.

allMovesData.name: Thousand Arrows
description: Makes Flying-type Pokémon vulnerable to Ground moves.

allMovesData.name: Thousand Waves
description: Target cannot flee or switch.

allMovesData.name: Topsy-Turvy
description: Reverses target's stat changes.

allMovesData.name: Trick-or-Treat
description: Adds Ghost type to target.

allMovesData.name: Venom Drench
description: Lowers poisoned target's Special Attack and Speed by 1 stage.

allMovesData.name: Water Shuriken
description: Hits 2-5 times.

allMovesData.name: Stomping Tantrum
description: Double power if the user's previous move failed.

allMovesData.name: Laser Focus
description: User's next move is guarateed to critical hit.

allMovesData.name: Throat Chop
description: Prevents target from using sound-based moves for two turns.

allMovesData.name: Brutal Swing
description: Hits all adjacent Pokemon.

allMovesData.name: Liquidation
description: 20% chance to flinch target.

allMovesData.name: Smart Strike
description: Ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

allMovesData.name: Spotlight
description: Priority. Only the target will be attacked during this turn.

allMovesData.name: Power Trip
description: Power increases by 20 for each of the user's positive stat changes.

allMovesData.name: Psychic Terrain
description: For 5 turns, increases Psychic move power by 1.5x, and prevents grounded Pokemon from being hit by priority moves.

allMovesData.name: Burn Up
description: Removes the user's Fire type.

allMovesData.name: Aurora Veil
description: Halves damage from Physical and Special attacks for 5 turns.

allMovesData.name: Strength Sap
description: Restores HP equal to the target's Attack stat. Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.

allMovesData.name: First Impression
description: Only works the first turn the user is in battle.

allMovesData.name: High Horsepower
description: No additional effect.

allMovesData.name: Toxic Thread
description: Poisons the target and lowers its speed by 1 Stage.

allMovesData.name: Psychic Fangs
description: Destroys Reflect and Light Screen barriers.

allMovesData.name: Lunge
description: Lowers target's Attack by 1 stage.

allMovesData.name: Tearful Look
description: Lowers target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.

allMovesData.name: Dragon Hammer
description: No additional effect.

allMovesData.name: Speed Swap
description: Swaps speed stats with the target.

allMovesData.name: Gear Up
description: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of allies with Plus/Minus by 1 stage.

allMovesData.name: Fire Lash
description: Lowers target's Defense by 1 stage.
